scripts.compile: npm run clean && webpack --mode production --env useFakes=false
scripts.compile:dev: npm run clean && webpack --mode development --env useFakes=true
scripts.build:devpub: npm run compile:dev && npm run publish-extension
scripts.pubdev: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension publish --service-url https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/ --rev-version --auth-type pat --token changeme --share-with dubsalot --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json ./src/Hubs/Pipeview/pipeview-dev.json
scripts.pub: npm run compile && npm run publishext
scripts.publishext: tfx extension publish --service-url https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/ --rev-version --auth-type pat --token changeme --share-with dubsalot --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json ./src/Hubs/Pipeview/pipeview-dev.json
scripts.local: npm run compile:dev && start http://localhost:8080/Pipeview/LocalPipeview.html && webpack serve --mode development --env useFakes=true
